sentences.sentence: We find that various evidentials functions evaluatively in construing attitude engagement and graduation.

sentences.sentence: The important reason for construing all this activity as activity on the part of bodies is to preserve the closed character of the system of the physical world.
sentences.translation: 把所有这样的活动解释为物体本身的活动，这样做的重要理由是维护物理世界系统的封闭性。
